message:
The #MannKiBaat episode on 29th January will primarily be on the various board exams coming up. It will be a programme for my young friends. Urging students, parents & teachers to share their thoughts & exam season experiences. Their views will surely inspire so many others.

You can share your thoughts & experiences for #MannKiBaat on the specially created forum on the App. http://nm4.in/dnldapp
